comments.body: Most `import` changes seems to be due to this relocation from `vectorized` to `execution`.

I think this depends on whether we want to also reorganize in this commit, or just move from SQL to Catalyst. @mccheah suggested reorganizing at the same time. I don't have a strong opinion on whether we do it at the same time or separately, but if we aren't reorganizing the v2 classes, then I agree that this should not move packages.
